name: Jquery-year-picker
tagline: Year picker plugin for jquery UI like datepicker. It allows user to select year from list.
body:
# jquery-year-picker Year picker plugin for jquery UI like datepicker. It allows user to select year from list. # Usage Place a textbox on your html page with an id or css class. Call yearpicker jquery method on specified id or class name. Yearpicker is reaedy.

Example
$("#txtDate").yearpicker({
changeYear: true
});

# Attributes changeYear : If value is true then it will display a dropdown to select year. Other wise you can use left/right arrow to change year.
minDate/maxDate : Restrict user to select year from specific range (same as jquery date picker).
dateFormat : format of date to be specified in minDate/maxDate attribute.
# Preview
